biotools.summary: Web server for the automatic modeling of immunoglobulin variable domains based on the canonical structure method. It has a user-friendly and flexible interface, that allows the user to choose templates (for the frameworks and the loops) and modeling strategies in an automatic or manual fashion.

bioschemas.name: PIGS
